review: Lots of things you need to pay for to watch and some apps give an error when opening th
author: jessie hash

review: Setup was very easy and I have enjoyed the streaming capabilities afforded. The YouTube app does not always work properly, but I have not tried other apps, so it may be an isolated issue.Very good streaming quality - would definitely recommend to anyone with a Prime account.
author: Ian

review: As a college student who was not willing to pay for cable, the fire stick is perfect for me and it is worth the purchase!
author: Amazon Customer

review: works fine the only problem I can't mirror my tablet wish I had more info on who's tablet will work
author: charles gray

review: Better than I expected...well worth the money!!
author: Richard Kalb

review: This product is leaps and bounds above the Google Chromecast, but the only down side is that I can't access YouTube (since it is a Google company.) The apps available through this product are easily downloaded and user friendly, just like the whole user interface. I highly suggest this product if you have a Prime membership and an addiction to Netflix.
author: Maggie Olander
